attributes.action: stop payments to the 2012 olympic logo designers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is to stop £400,000 of your money being payed to the 2012 olympic logo designers because it has caused people to have epilictic attaks and serius migrains!Also the logo and the animated clip didn't pass a test to show it on the T.V!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
